item.title: User: Customer Orders-Total
item.description: This report lists your customers ranked by their lifetime value.

item.title: User: Customers Referral
item.description:
This report creates a list of orders having a specified referral or coupon code.

Note that this is only relevant for stores that set Customers Referral Status to “1” or “2” on the Admin > Configuration > Customer Details screen. See Customer Referral Processing for more details.

The page opens showing the following fields on a form:

  • a selector list of customer referral codes (which the customer entered when they created their account).
  • a start and end date

Change these fields as needed and press the Display button.

Orders matching this referral code will be displayed in a list.

item.title: User: Products Low Stock
item.description: This report shows your products ranked by quantity in stock, in ascending order, so that you can quickly identify which products need to be re-ordered.

item.title: User: Products Purchased
item.description:
This report shows all your products, ranked in sales order.

The Products Purchased Report queries the orders_products table to get an exact count of the number of products sold.

Note: This is different from how the Bestsellers Sidebox is built: the bestsellers list is based on the products_ordered field in the products table, which can be manipulated using the Reset ALL Products Ordered button in the Store Manager.

item.title: User: Products Viewed
item.description:
This report lists of the number of times each product has been “viewed” (page visited).

The default reporting range is “the past year”, but you can change this as needed.

Note: In Zen Cart 1.5.7, the products_viewed data gathering was refactored to improve performance, so for upgraders from pre_1.5.7 to 1.5.7 or above, data will not be available for the interval prior to the upgrade date. Prior to v1.5.7 the numbers could not be filtered by a date range: they represented “all views since the counters were reset to 0”.

item.title: User: Sales Report with Graphs
item.description:
This report shows sales in both graphical and tabular format.

An alternative tool to generate tabular sales reports is the Sales Report plugin.
